cli

Interface ExecutionContext.Interface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Choice, ExecutionContext.Common, ExecutionContext.Java, ExecutionContext.Native, Float, Int, Less, Line, More, Password, Shell, UI, YesNo
    Enclosing class:
    ExecutionContext

    public static interface ExecutionContext.Interface
    Generic execution context interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getInput

        IODevice.Interface getInput()
        Input stream accessor.
        Returns:
        The input stream attached to the context for its execution.

      • getStream

        OutputDevice.Interface getStream(int E_StreamType)
        Output stream accessor.
        Parameters:
        E_StreamType - Output stream identifier.
        Returns:
        The required stream. null if an error occured.

      • setStream

        boolean setStream(int E_StreamType,
                OutputDevice.Interface CLI_Stream)
        Output stream positionning.
        Parameters:
        E_StreamType - Output stream identifier.
        CLI_Stream - Stream reference.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure.

      • streamEnabled

        boolean streamEnabled(int E_StreamType)
        Enabled/disabled stream status accessor.
        Parameters:
        E_StreamType - Output stream identifier.
        Returns:
        true: the stream is enabled, false: the stream is disabled.

      • enableStream

        boolean enableStream(int E_StreamType,
                   boolean B_Enable)
        Enabling/disabling output streams.
        Parameters:
        E_StreamType - Output stream identifier.
        B_Enable - Enable flag.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure.

      • setLang

        void setLang(int E_Lang)
        Language setting.
        Parameters:
        E_Lang - New value.

      • getLang

        int getLang()
        Language access.
        Returns:
        The language currently set.

      • setBeep

        void setBeep(boolean B_Enable)
        Beep configuration setting.
        Parameters:
        B_Enable - New value.

      • getBeep

        boolean getBeep()
        Beep configuration access.
        Returns:
        The current beep configuration. true if enabled, false otherwise.

      • watchResult

        void watchResult(ExecutionResult CLI_Result)
        Context execution result interface registration. Note: Registration for each interface is discarded as soon as the end of execution is notified.

      • run

        boolean run(IODevice.Interface CLI_IODevice)
        Runs the execution context onto the corresponding input/output device. Call this runner method, for top execution contexts.
        Parameters:
        CLI_IODevice - Input/output device to run onto.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure.

      • run

        boolean run()
        Runs the execution context as a child context of the parent given by the construction. Call this runner method, for child execution contexts.
        Returns:
        true: success, false: failure.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Tells whether this execution context is running or not.
        Returns:
        The running status.

      • stopExecution

        void stopExecution()
        Terminates this execution context's execution. Warning: Not thread safe. Implement a non blocking device if your CLI execution should interact with external events.

      • stopAllExecutions

        void stopAllExecutions()
        Terminates execution for all execution contexts attached to the same top execution context. Warning: Not thread safe. Implement a non blocking device if your CLI execution should interact with external events.

      • getNativeRef

        int getNativeRef()
        Native object interface compliance.
        Returns:
        The native reference of the instance.
